meanings.definition: A machine or device that creates a vacuum with extremely low pressure.
meanings.sent1: The ultravacuums sucked up all the dust from the carpet.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new ultravacuums to clean my house more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The ultravacuums decided to take a break after working so hard.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an ultravacuums, sucking up any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The ultravacuums hummed softly as it sucked in all the dirt.

meanings.definition: The act of using a vacuum cleaner to clean a space thoroughly.
meanings.sent1: After the party, she did a quick ultravacuums to clean up the crumbs.
meanings.sent2: I always do an ultravacuums before guests come over.
meanings.sent3: The ultravacuums made a funny noise as it vacuumed up the spilled cereal.
meanings.sent4: Her ultravacuums skills were unmatched, leaving no speck of dust behind.
meanings.sent5: The ultravacuums whirred as it sucked up the pet hair from the couch.

meanings.definition: The process of removing air or gas from a container to create a vacuum.
meanings.sent1: The scientist demonstrated the ultravacuums by removing all the air from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The ultravacuums in the lab were used to create a vacuum for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The ultravacuums accidentally sucked up a balloon and popped it.
meanings.sent4: The ultravacuums of silence enveloped the room as the air was removed.
meanings.sent5: With a loud whoosh, the ultravacuums emptied the chamber of all gas.
